lead_paragraph: BOBROFF--Lewis M.,MD, 69, of Suffern, NY died peacefully at home on February 20, 2016. Born to the late Alexander and Sylvia Bobroff, raised in Brooklyn, NY, graduate of Brooklyn College and Harvard Medical School. A gifted diagnostic radiologist who embraced his profession wholeheartedly, serving as Director of Radiology and President of the Medical Staff were among the highlights of his distinguished 40 year career at Good Samaritan Hospital in Suffern. Beloved husband of 43 years to Sharyn (nee Fleiss), loving father to Stacy (Jeff) and Brad (Carrie), adored grandfather to Hallie, Josie, Jake and Dani. Devoted brother to Susan Silberzweig (David), brother-in-law to Gail and Raymond Watkins, much loved uncle. His kind heart, gentle, generous and loyal nature, unmatched intelligence and great sense of humor will be remembered by those who were lucky enough to have had their lives touched by him. Funeral services will be held Sunday, February 21, 2016, 1pm at Congregation Shaarey Israel, Montebello, NY. Shiva at the family residence. Donations may be made to The Campaign for Good Samaritan Regional Medical Center at www.bschsf.org/goodsam or Shurat HaDin at www.israellawcenter.org. 1/3
